content: we are proud to introduce a brand new baby in the biscotte yarns family ♥ ======================================== to celebrate the arrival of this beloved baby we are pleased to offer you this beanie pattern in which every stitch has been knitted with love ---------------------------------------- **in addition to the free pattern you will need the following material to knit this baby hat ** **material** biscotte yarns - bis-sock 85% merino sw 15% nylon 400 m per 100 g skein 20 g of yarn approx 75 meters shown in the self-striping autorayante™ laundry day colorway double pointed or circular needles of 3 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle **gauge** 26 sts = 10 cm in stockinette stitch **final size** head circumference = 30 cm unstretch height = 17 cm la version française se trouve sur leslainesbiscotte com 1 1 https //biscotte org/nathan
